CustomField.description: Secret key set in the payment settings of your TouchNet UPay site. This is used to help encrypt a key for more secure data posting. To be set first in "Passed Amount Validation Key" in your touchnet Payment settings and recorded identically here.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Secret key set in the payment settings of your TouchNet UPay site. This is used to help encrypt a key for more secure data posting. To be set first in "Passed Amount Validation Key" in your touchnet Payment settings and recorded identically here.
CustomField.label: Validation Key
